original_text: But the vine was already growing in a good field where there was plenty of water. It could grow very well in that place, with new branches. It could become a beautiful vine and make grapes there.”
korean_text: 그 포도나무를 큰 물 가 옥토에 심은 것은 가지를 내고 열매를 맺어서 아름다운 포도나무를 이루게 하려 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: But the vine was already growing
in a good field where there was plenty of water
It could grow very well in that place
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 매우 잘 자랄 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: It could become a beautiful vine

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 포도를 맺을 수 있었습니다
